import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { CKEditor } from '@ckeditor/ckeditor5-react' import ClassicEditor from '@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic' import './style.css' export function StaffPage(props) { const [text, setText] = useState('') return (

Requirements

Must be 14 years old


APPLICATION

What do you believe the goal of a staff team is? (60 word minimum):


What are three strengths and weaknesses you have? (80 word minimum):


Why should we choose you over other applications? (100 word minimum):

"} editor={ClassicEditor} />
